body:
Hi,


Is there any file format interoperability between Radiance and  
Maxwell. (http://www.maxwellrender.com/)
Maxwell makes very pretty pictures but I see no way to capture the  
lighting data from an image or scene and wondered if there are any  
plans to make some file interchange possible.


Thanks,


Chris Jessee
___
